Reviews.Title: “A quiet and charming hotel in a great location.”

Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights location 5 minutes beach else wallmart bus stations restaurants noisy safe 3 single beds clean bathroom kitchen refrigerator microwave electric oven helpful easy kept bags shower reception day leaving checkout pool light getting vegetation water cold beautiful
